titleStmt.title: An Exact account of the siege of Namur with a perfect diary of the campagne in Flanders, from the King's departure from Kensington, May the 12th, to his return to London, Octob. 11th, 1695 / by a gentleman attending His Majesty during the whole campagne.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman attending His Majesty during the whole campagne.
